Project Description
this project aims to provide an easy-to-use API, for sound synthesis under winrt, in c#. It use the XAudio2 api for the playback of the sound.

This library is used by "AudioCanvas" , a music software for winrt where you draw your music

The implemented features are :

  • Waveform Oscillators : Sinus, Triangle, Square and Sawtooth
  • SynthInstrument : an instrument composed by a collection of oscillators, with different parameters
    • Aditive synthesis
    • PM (phase modulation) synthesis
  • Sample based instrument, to play realistic instrument sound using SynthVoice.
  • SynthVoice wich use the SynthInstrument to generate te waveform, with this voice you can play music notes
    • Loading the instrument
    • Playing a note (using the note number (semitone + octave*12)
  • A SynthInstrument editor
    • Load/Save file
    • Add oscillators
    • Modify oscillators parameters
    • Play notes from a visual keyboard (for preview)
    • Display the waveform
